name: OrganizationAffiliation.active
title: OrganizationAffiliation.active
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: Whether this organization affiliation record is in active use
element.definition: Whether this organization affiliation record is in active use.
element.comment: If this value is false, you may refer to the period to see when the role was in active use. If there is no period specified, no inference can be made about when it was active.
element.requirements: Need to be able to mark an organization affiliation record as not to be used because it was created in error, or otherwise no longer in active use.
element.meaningWhenMissing: This resource is generally assumed to be active if no value is provided for the active element
